segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman at the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron, looking so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing, water pouring everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is already wet, yet she keeps polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, there's a boy on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, her hand out waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, hoping the woman doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, such a contrast to this indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're pulling this off right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
